title: Authors and Citation
text: David Schoch. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Schoch D (2023). snahelper: 'RStudio' Addin Network Analysis Visualization. https://github.com/schochastics/snahelper, https://schochastics.github.io/snahelper/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {snahelper: 'RStudio' Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization},   author = {David Schoch},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/schochastics/snahelper, https://schochastics.github.io/snahelper/}, }

what: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: snahelper provides set RStudio Addin social network analysis. main addin SNAhelper provides simple GUI common network analytic tasks visualize network ggraph. second addin, called Netbuilder allows quickly build small networks small “canvas” draw . network can exported igraph object end session clicking “Done”. third addin Netreader meant facilitated import raw network data. provides GUI easily read network attribute data combine igraph object. underlying code import procedure shown end. help users learn importing data . fourth addin Componentlayouter allows layout networks several components manually placing empty canvas. Components can also rotated resized. finishing session, layout saved x y vertex attributes.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: Code reproduce used network.
code: library(tidyverse) library(igraph) url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/evelinag/StarWars-social-network/master/networks/starwars-full-interactions-allCharacters.json" df <- jsonlite::fromJSON(url)  df$nodes$id <- 1:nrow(df$nodes) df$nodes$display <- df$nodes$name df$nodes$name <- df$nodes$id-1 g <- graph_from_data_frame(df$links,directed = F,vertices = df$nodes)  V(g)$name <- V(g)$display  g <- remove.vertex.attribute(g,"id") g <- remove.vertex.attribute(g,"display") g <- delete.vertices(g,which(degree(g)==0))  V(g)$display <- ifelse(V(g)$value>75,V(g)$name,"") V(g)$colour <- ifelse(V(g)$display=="",NA,V(g)$display)  g

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: Netreader pretty selfexplanatory. first two tabs allow import raw data (edges attributes). Make sure specify file delimiters, etc. according shown preview.  Using Netreader comes learning effect (hopefully). last tab shows R code produce network chosen data without using Addin. network saved global environment click “Done”.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: Highlight igraph object script selcet Componentlayouter RStudio addin menu. Components added clicking canvas can resized/rotated re-positioned using buttons bottom. final layout stored x y coordinates igraph object.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: work properly, also need graphlayouts, adds new layout algorithms.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: use main addin, simply highlight network script select SNAhelper Addin dropdown menu.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: layout tab allows choose implemented algorithms igraph layouts graphlayouts. default stress based layout also recommended choice. See blog explanation. tweak section can move individual nodes around. Choose node dropdown menu click new position plot.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: Node Attribute Manager shows existing node attributes sortable table. addition, can calculate new ones (centrality clustering). functions automatically choose right version indices, depending network directed/weighted/undirected/unweighted.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: can style nodes. can either manually, choosing color/size nodes together, based attribute.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: Node Attribute Manager edges. far shows existing edge attributes.

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: can style edges . snahelper automatically detects network directed adds arrows network directed. options similar nodes tab. snahelper automatically chooses appropriate edge geom. multiple edges present, uses geom_edge_parallel0(). Otherwise geom_edge_link0().

title: RStudio Addin for Network Analysis and Visualization
text: result tab shows network full size. satisfied results, hit Done button R code produce plot automatically inserted script. can directly save result png file.

title: Componentlayouter — Componentlayouter
text: Componentlayouter RStudio-Addin facilitates layouting networks several components.

title: Componentlayouter — Componentlayouter
text: Componentlayouter returns layout xy coordinates.

title: Componentlayouter — Componentlayouter
text: run addin, highlight igraph-object current script select Componentlayouter Addins-menu within RStudio.

title: Netbuilder — Netbuilder
text: Netbuilder RStudio-Addin allows create small networks point click.

title: Netbuilder — Netbuilder
text: Netbuilder returns created network igraph object.

title: Netbuilder — Netbuilder
text: run addin, select Netbuilder Addins-menu within RStudio.

title: Netreader — Netreader
text: Netreader RStudio-Addin allows read network files. far, plaintext files supported (e.g. csv,tsv,...).

title: Netreader — Netreader
text: Netreader returns created network igraph object.

title: Netreader — Netreader
text: run addin, select Netreader Addins-menu within RStudio.

title: SNAhelper — SNAhelper
text: SNAhelper RStudio-Addin provides graphical interface network analysis visualization.

title: SNAhelper — SNAhelper
text: graph igraph object visualize

title: SNAhelper — SNAhelper
text: SNAhelper returns character vector code.

title: SNAhelper — SNAhelper
text: run addin, highlight igraph-object current script select SNAhelper Addins-menu within RStudio. terminating addin, character string containing code visualization inserted current script. Alternatively can run SNAhelperGadget(graph) console.

title: snahelper 1.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-21 fixed bug directed degree snahelper fixed weighted adjacency matrix bug netreader

title: snahelper 1.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-12-17 Snahelper now reproducible also returning coordinates explicitly fixed deprecated FA 5 sliders name (changed sliders-h)

title: snahelper 1.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-09-03 added layout via stored node variables x y added drop = FALSE Netreader cases one attribute read minor bug fixes

title: snahelper 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-09-13 added componentlayouter

title: snahelper 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-03-03 Fixed bug prevented calculation /degree directed networks Fixed bug produced warnings directed networks Fixed label variable name field netbuilder netreader Switched plot control panel layout remove scrolling issue. Use {{DT}} table rendering due persistent issue character attributes.

title: snahelper 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-09-03 BREAKING works newest ggraph version (2.0.0) (error message added) added Netbuilder addin added Netreader addin edge geom chosen automatically geom_edge_link0() geom_edge_parallel0() discrete edge colors supported now added support layout_with_focus() layout_with_centrality()

title: snahelper 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-07-03 tweaking node position now possible via clicking desired location added formatR nicer code output added backbone layout support centrality indices node attribute manager automatically adapt type graph (directed/weighted/etc.)

title: snahelper 0.2.0
text: added option repel node labels removed curvature edges added manual alpha tuning switched geom_edge_arc geom_edge_fan changed default colors increased max node size added colourpicker support

title: snahelper 0.1.0
text: initial version
